product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Material
product.description: Defines a product's primary material, such as cotton or wool

product.name: Shape
product.description: Describes the geometric form or shape of a product, such as round or heart

product.name: Theme
product.description: Describes the product's primary theme or motif, such as sport, space, or holidays

product.name: Mouse pad features
product.description: Describes unique characteristics of a mouse pad, such as lighting or stitched edges

product.name: Power source
product.description: Specifies the power source a product uses to operate, such as solar or batteries

product.name: Connection type
product.description: Specifies the type of connection used by electronics, such as wired or Bluetooth

product.name: Mouse technology
product.description: Specifies the functionality or design of a computer mouse, such as wireless or gaming

product.name: Mouse/Trackball features
product.description: Describes special characteristics of mice/trackballs, like ergonomic design or adjustable weight

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids
